result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

Cash bond is set in the amount of $1,000 (per case). If the defendant posts cash bail, the defendant must report to and comply with Pretrial Services. The defendant shall report to Pretrial Services by 10:00 A.M. on the business day following his/her release from jail. The following checked category(s) are also ordered: _x_ GPS, _x_ Remote Breath (Alcohol) Monitoring, and/or __ Random Drug Testing. 
- Defendant shall not have any contact, direct or indirect, with DLM. 
- Defendant shall not be at any residence or workplace of DLM. 
- Defendant shall not be in the 400 block of Woodvale Dr in Deforest.
- Defendant shall not have any contact, direct or indirect, with any employee of the Deforest School District. 
NONCOMPLIANCE WILL BE REPORTED BY DCPS TO THE JUDICIARY WHO SHALL RESPOND IN ONE OF THESE WAYS: Schedule bail hearing, Increase Supervision, Issue warrant, No change but monitor.

Defendant Karl C Erstad in court, in custody with Attorney Shaun W O'Connell.  Attorney Carl Lazarus in court for State of Wisconsin. State moves to dismiss felony count; granted. Court orders count 1 dismissed.

Referral to Dane County Pretrial Services (DCPS)

Cash bond is set in the amount of $2,000 (per case). If the defendant posts cash bail, the defendant must report to and comply with Pretrial Services. The defendant shall report to Pretrial Services by 10:00 A.M. on the business day following his/her release from jail. 
The following checked category(s) are also ordered: _x_ GPS, _x_ Remote Breath (Alcohol) Monitoring, and/or __ Random Drug Testing. 
NONCOMPLIANCE WILL BE REPORTED BY DCPS TO THE JUDICIARY WHO SHALL RESPOND IN ONE OF THESE WAYS: Schedule bail hearing, Increase Supervision, Issue warrant, No change but monitor. 
- Defendant shall not have any contact, direct or indirect, with DLM. 
- Defendant shall not be at any residence or workplace of DLM. 
- Defendant shall not be in the 400 block of Woodvale Dr in Deforest.
- Defendant shall not have any contact, direct or indirect, with any employee of the Deforest School District. 
Parties did not stipulate to waive the time limits for Preliminary Hearing.
